La Victoria es por Naturaleza Insolente y Arrogante:
se refiere a la apoteosis que acompaña al triunfador en la guerra o en el combate,
y èsta condiciòn es en esencia inestable y efìmera; pero hay una victoria que es mas perdurable:
La victoria que se consigue enfrentando nuestras debilidades. Esa no es ni insolente ni arrogante,
por el contrario nos imprime esa serena confianza del verdadero triunfador.

It‘s a good game and worth to try

I haven't played on steam in nearly 12 years, after buying a decent gaming PC i decided to return. To be honest i mainly play racing sims on PlayStation but decided to give FPS games a try and what else is a better game then the original CS-GO. At the time of this review i have 10 hrs playing the game but i can see why its considered one of the best. I watched a lot of content on YouTube and read a reviews and guides, bought premium and jumped into the thick of it. I can see myself playing this game a lot, If you want something you can chill and tune out to this is a great game to do that to. Once i have a few more hours in game i'll write another more updated review but for now, this game is worth checking out.
